languages.text: Устаревшая система вентиляции соединяет между собой все канализационные отсеки этого сектора. Чтобы обезвредить похитителей, Вольному Торговцу достаточно вовремя пустить по трубам усыпляющий газ.

traits.locale_text: Устаревшая система вентиляции соединяет между собой все канализационные отсеки этого сектора. Чтобы обезвредить похитителей, Вольному Торговцу достаточно вовремя пустить по трубам усыпляющий газ.

languages.text: The antiquated ventilation system interconnects all parts of the sewers in this sector. To neutralise the captors, all the Rogue Trader needs to do is pump sleeping gas through the pipes at the right time.
languages.original_text: Устаревшая система вентиляции соединяет между собой все канализационные отсеки этого сектора. Чтобы обезвредить похитителей, Вольному Торговцу достаточно вовремя пустить по трубам усыпляющий газ.

traits.locale_text: The antiquated ventilation system interconnects all parts of the sewers in this sector. To neutralise the captors, all the Rogue Trader needs to do is pump sleeping gas through the pipes at the right time.

The antiquated ventilation system interconnects all parts of the sewers in this sector. To neutralise the captors, all the Rogue Trader needs to do is pump sleeping gas through the pipes at the right time.

The antiquated ventilation system interconnects all parts of the sewers in this sector. To neutralise the captors, all the Rogue Trader needs to do is pump sleeping gas through the pipes at the right time.

The antiquated ventilation system interconnects all parts of the sewers in this sector. To neutralise the captors, all the Rogue Trader needs to do is pump sleeping gas through the pipes at the right time.

languages.text: Le système de ventilation archaïque relie toutes les sections des égouts de ce secteur. Pour neutraliser les ravisseurs, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} doit simplement injecter du gaz soporifique dans les tuyaux au bon moment.
languages.original_text: The antiquated ventilation system interconnects all parts of the sewers in this sector. To neutralise the captors, all the Rogue Trader needs to do is pump sleeping gas through the pipes at the right time.

traits.locale_text: Le système de ventilation archaïque relie toutes les sections des égouts de ce secteur. Pour neutraliser les ravisseurs, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} doit simplement injecter du gaz soporifique dans les tuyaux au bon moment.

languages.text: 陈旧的通风系统连接着下水道所有区域。为了解决法尔科和他的同伙，行商浪人需要在合适时机将催眠气体送到通风管道里。
languages.original_text: The antiquated ventilation system interconnects all parts of the sewers in this sector. To neutralise the captors, all the Rogue Trader needs to do is pump sleeping gas through the pipes at the right time.

traits.locale_text: 陈旧的通风系统连接着下水道所有区域。为了解决法尔科和他的同伙，行商浪人需要在合适时机将催眠气体送到通风管道里。

languages.text: 旧式の換気システムは、この区画の下水道すべての部分と相互接続している。敵を無力化するために自由開拓者がすべきことは、タイミング良く配管を通して催眠ガスを送り込むことである。
languages.original_text: The antiquated ventilation system interconnects all parts of the sewers in this sector. To neutralise the captors, all the Rogue Trader needs to do is pump sleeping gas through the pipes at the right time.

traits.locale_text: 旧式の換気システムは、この区画の下水道すべての部分と相互接続している。敵を無力化するために自由開拓者がすべきことは、タイミング良く配管を通して催眠ガスを送り込むことである。

languages.text: Das antiquierte Lüftungssystem verbindet sämtliche Teile der Kanalisation in diesem Sektor. Um die Entführer zu neutralisieren, muss {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} lediglich im richtigen Augenblick Schlafgas durch die Rohre pumpen.
languages.original_text: The antiquated ventilation system interconnects all parts of the sewers in this sector. To neutralise the captors, all the Rogue Trader needs to do is pump sleeping gas through the pipes at the right time.

traits.locale_text: Das antiquierte Lüftungssystem verbindet sämtliche Teile der Kanalisation in diesem Sektor. Um die Entführer zu neutralisieren, muss {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} lediglich im richtigen Augenblick Schlafgas durch die Rohre pumpen.

languages.text: El antiguo sistema de ventilación conecta todas las secciones de las cloacas de este sector. Neutralizar a los secuestradores es tan sencillo como bombear gas soporífero por las cañerías en el momento adecuado.
languages.original_text: The antiquated ventilation system interconnects all parts of the sewers in this sector. To neutralise the captors, all the Rogue Trader needs to do is pump sleeping gas through the pipes at the right time.

traits.locale_text: El antiguo sistema de ventilación conecta todas las secciones de las cloacas de este sector. Neutralizar a los secuestradores es tan sencillo como bombear gas soporífero por las cañerías en el momento adecuado.

languages.text: Eskimiş havalandırma sistemi, bu sektörde kanalizasyonun tüm parçalarını birbirine bağlıyor. Tutsak edenleri etkisiz hâle getirmek için Hür Tacir'in yapması gereken tek şey, doğru anda borular aracılığıyla uyku gazı pompalamak.
languages.original_text: The antiquated ventilation system interconnects all parts of the sewers in this sector. To neutralise the captors, all the Rogue Trader needs to do is pump sleeping gas through the pipes at the right time.
